lines.text: Ah, yes, these were truly the days of wooden ships and iron men, but some of the iron was getting a little rusty.
You fed our passengers well, Mr. Kobb?
Good, Ill not have it said that Bloodthirsty Ben is lacking in his duties as a host. Now that you have dined the two gentlemen, wine them.

[to Lord Montrose]
It's all very simple. A bullet through your heart...

[to Davey]
We have our own ways of testing a man's mettle.
